rules_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact token: Put a quote counter on Lenore’s Writings.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a nontoken artifact: Put a quote counter on Lenore’s Writings and scry 1.
When there are five or more quote counters on Lenore’s Writings, sacrifice it. You may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card for each quote counter on it. If you don’t, draw two cards.
